post_content:
Hello all,

I’m completing several sets and upgrading others.  Looking for the following subjects mostly in PSA 7 graded but will consider PSA 6s in specified areas or if you have an off/rareback PSA 6.  Please message if you have something available!  [url]Paul.curlee1@gmail.com[/url]


Bescher portrait
Hoblitzell (PSA 7 only)
Campbell
Griffith port (sweet cap OP only)
Any reds 350 series EPDG back (PSA 6+)
Pastorius
Wheat (PSA 6 only)
Rucker throwing
